long_description: No matter wear you roam, the light and collapsible Ruffwear Bivy pet bowl serves up food and water with ease, letting you treat your dog like the best friend that he is. Welded nylon fabric creates a watertight seal. Bowl collapses down small to fit in a corner of your dog pack or day pack. Stable shape and wide, slip-resistant bottom allow easy eating and drinking. Medium size holds up to 51 fl. oz. (1.5 liters). The Ruffwear Bivy pet bowl cleans up easily and features a hang loop for clipping to your pack or hanging out to dry.
short_description: No matter wear you roam, the light and collapsible Ruffwear Bivy pet bowl serves up food and water with ease, letting you treat your dog like the best friend that he is.
